unnormalised: Arey yaar, pesticide use is too much, no? My nani in Kerala says her paddy fields were better before, like pre-1990. Now, everything's chemical-chemical. Heard Dr. Swaminathan's institute is working on alternatives? My uncle Ramesh says by 2025, things will be better. Hope so! Remember 26/01? Let's aim for that level of clean farming by then. 17:00 hrs is tea time-pesticide free tea only! Rs. 50 chai is better if itâ€™s organic.
normalised: Arey yaar, pesticide use is too much, no? My nani in Kerala says her paddy fields were better before, like pre nineteen ninety. Now, everything's chemical-chemical. Heard Doctor Swaminathan's institute is working on alternatives? My uncle Ramesh says by two thousand and twenty five, things will be better. Hope so! Remember twenty sixth january? Let's aim for that level of clean farming by then. Seventeen hundred hours is tea time-pesticide free tea only! Rupee fifty chai is better if it's organic.
